article.title: My First Webinar
article.author: Vladimír Záhradník
article.excerpt: What do you need to train people over the Internet?

authors.bio:
Hi there, I'm Vladimír. I work as a freelance software engineer; at the time,
I focus mostly on mobile and embedded development. I always strive to overcome my
limits — that is the reason why I'm so interested in startups and entrepreneurship.
Also, I love music, especially live events in the clubs.
authors.name: Vladimír Záhradník

next.title: Raspberry Pi as a home router
next.author: Vladimír Záhradník
next.excerpt: The latest generation of Raspberry Pi is powerful enough to serve as a decent home router. What leads to my decision to use it, and what's my experience?

next.title: Merkur — A construction set you've never heard of!
next.author: Vladimír Záhradník
next.excerpt: After ten years, I found my old Merkur construction set. It brings memories and thoughts about how I can make it useful again.
